This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

ObservationType

Identifies the kinds of observations that can be performed (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16226)

This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a _ObservationType
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org

name: ObservationType
